name: Mushroom Soup
description: Velvety cream of mushroom soup. Rich, aromatic and perfect for cold days.

instructions.instruction: Melt half the butter in a large pot.
Add mushrooms, cook 8-10 minutes until liquid evaporates and they brown.
Remove half the mushrooms and set aside for garnish.
Add remaining butter, sauté onion for 5 minutes.
Sprinkle flour, cook 2 minutes while stirring.
instructions.tip: Important to cook out raw flour taste.

instructions.instruction: Gradually add broth while stirring constantly.
Add thyme, bring to boil, then simmer 15 minutes.
Stir in milk and cream. Season with salt and pepper.
Serve in bowls topped with reserved mushrooms and parsley.

tips: Mix different mushroom varieties for richer flavor.
Use coconut cream for vegan version.
Add truffle oil for a luxurious touch.
Pat mushrooms dry for better browning.
storageInfo: Refrigerate 4 days, freeze up to 2 months.
variations: Use porcini mushrooms for deeper flavor.
Add sherry for an elegant twist.
